Text: AirTran Airways Philadelphia OneDay SaleAirTran Airways today launched a special oneday sale for travel from Philadelphia This sale on sevenday advance purchase tickets is valid to all cities served by AirTran Airways from Philadelphia These fares are available for purchase for one day only Tuesday November with all travel completed by March These fares are discounted up to percent from
